titles.title: Financial Watchdog Support Act
To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to eliminate the double-sided confirmation requirement for swap data repositories.
Financial Watchdog Support Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary:
Financial Watchdog Support Act
This bill eliminates the requirement that a swap data repository must confirm the accuracy of submitted data with both parties participating in the swap.
